journal-title-group.journal-title: Soviet and Eastern European Foreign Trade

title-group.article-title: The Influence of Bulgaria's Economic Ties with CMEA Members on Some Proportions in Its Economy

p.mixed-citation: "Vliianieto na ikonomicheskite vr"zki na NRB s"s stranite-chlenki na SIV, v"rkhu niakoi narodnostopanski proportsii," Vunshna turgoviia (So- fia), 1981, no. 9, pp. 2-7. Translated by Peter Maggs.

ref.mixed-citation: Thus, for instance, with a base of 1970 = 100, the national income had grown by 1979 by 165 percent, while the foreign trade goods exchange for the same period at the prices of the corresponding year had grown by 269 percent
